title: Himi 279
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Oku ‘i he Laumālie,
Ke ne faka’ilo,
Ki he loto ‘oku feinga,
’A Sīsū Kalaisi.
2.
He ‘oku ne tokoni mai,
Ki he loto vaivai
Ke hoko ai, ‘a e tui,
Ke nau mo’ui ai.
3.
Pea mo e ‘ofa lahi,
‘A hotau ‘Otua,
‘Oku ‘ikai fa’a ‘ilo,
‘E he angahia.
4.
’A hono ma’olunga fau;
Mo hono loloto,
‘A hono lōloa, pea,
Mo hono maukupu;
5.
’O e ‘ofa, ‘a e ‘Eiki,
Ki he kakai hia,
‘Oku ‘i he Laumālie,
Ke ne faka’ilo.*
